name: 戦場の狼II
summary: Mercs, originally released as Senjō no Ōkami II (戦場の狼Ⅱ Wolf of the Battlefield II), is a 1990 top-down run and gun arcade game developed and published by Capcom for the arcades. It is a followup to the 1985 Commando. It was followed by Wolf of the Battlefield: Commando 3 in 2008, a downloadable game.
